    public class DetaljiNarudzbeActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    The type Detalji narudzbe activity is used for preview of customers order depending on table. * Set content view activity_detalji_narudzbe layout

                        android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:

      • setTableStatusFree

        private void setTableStatusFree()

      • getBill

        public void getBill()
        Gets bill get data from Firestore. Data from "Racun" collection and document which has "stil_id" value that equals stolID. * If error occurs during fetching data, displays error message

      • getOrders

        public void getOrders(int racunID)
        Gets orders get data from Firestore. Data from "Narudzba" collection and and document which has "racun_id" value that equals racunID.

        If error occurs during fetching data, displays error message

        Parameters:
        racunID - the racun id current bill

      • getOrderItem

        public void getOrderItem(int orderID)
        Gets order item get data from Firestore. Data from "Stavka narudzbe" collection and document which has "narudzba_id" value that equals orderID.

        If error occurs during fetching data, displays error message

        Parameters:
        orderID - the order id current order

      • getOrderArticles

        public void getOrderArticles(int articleID)
        Gets order articles from Firestore. Data from "Artikl" collection and document which has "id" value that equals articleID. Adding article to listaArtikala list which consist of articles If error occurs during fetching data, displays error message
        Parameters:
        articleID - the article id selected article from article list
